entry.title: Web of Things Summer school 2013
entry.content:
Some Dynamid team members were in the organization and scientific committees of this school about Web of Things.

Here is school's website in french, with the program.

entry.title: Smartphone Gateway Poster @ CFSE, Grenoble, 2013
entry.content:
Roya Golchay will present preliminary ideas of her PhD work in the CFSE 2013 conference.

CFSE is the top French national conference on operating system research. The program committee comprises big names in the field, and we hope many interesting discussions over coffee about the poster.

entry.title: Frederic Le Mouel participates to Zhang Heng Program in China
entry.content:
Frédéric Le Mouël participates to the Zhang Heng program about "Smart Cities and Internet of Things" organized by the French Ministry of Foreign Affairs and particularly the French Embassy in China from October, 14th to 20th.

The program includes visits of Chinese Academy of Sciences, National Natural Science Foundation of China, Beihang University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, plans discussions and workshops between French and Chinese researchers to initiate project collaborations.
